title: Becoming a Private Detective
headline: Learn how to become a private investigator in this free online course that provides the skills you need as a detective.
description: Ever wondered what it takes to become a private detective? There is a growing demand for private investigators and the job is exciting and offers new challenges every day in an expanding field. We provide key skills like interrogation and crime scene analysis to prepare you for your first case. This course covers the investigative and legal aspects of detective work and also explains how to set up your own small investigative business.
courseDescription:
With the ever-changing nature of crime placing conventional policing systems under pressure, people and organisations are increasingly turning towards private investigators to meet their security needs. This has created a high demand for skilled, well-trained private investigators. This course provides a simple guide filled with productive, innovative, up-to-date investigative techniques, procedures and business skills. It not only prepares you for a career in this intriguing and lucrative field but also upgrades your existing knowledge and skills.

We designed this comprehensive training course to provide you with an interactive learning experience that provides a detailed understanding of the surveillance and security sectors and your role in them. We explain investigative concepts and processes like crime scene investigation and the classification of crimes. We also equip you with crucial industry-specific skills such as interviewing and interrogation skills, fingerprint verification, handwriting examination and linking and surveillance of suspects. This course leaves you confident in your ability to work proficiently as a private investigator or detective.

We designed this course specifically for those looking for a future in investigative roles and careers and those professionals looking to upgrade their existing skills. The course is packed with the most relevant and latest investigative skills, resources and techniques. If you think you have what it takes to be a good private detective, sign up to kick-start your career and turn your eye for detail and ability to solve mysteries into a rewarding career that presents new challenges every day.
